table.name: emission_factor
table.description: This table stores the different emission factor values and corresponding uom code for a emission rule with additional attributes as attribute flex fields. For example intensity factor 20 KG/T-KM

columns.name: EMISSION_RULE_GID
columns.description: Emission rule for which the emission factor is defined.

columns.name: EMISSION_FACTOR_SEQ_NO
columns.description: Sequence of the emission factor in the emission rule.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description for the emission factor.

columns.name: ESG_EMISSION_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Emission for which the emission factor is defined.

columns.name: EMISSION_FACTOR_VALUE
columns.description: Value of the emission factor for emission specified.

columns.name: EMISSION_FACTOR_VALUE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UOM code of the emission factor value for the emission.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE1
columns.description: Attribute fields (flexfields) allow you to add additional information about an object. Data Type VARCHAR2 (150)
